retention_strategy: URGENT - High Risk: Customer has a >20% chance of churning within 6 months. Recommendation: Proactive wellness call from a senior support agent and a high-value, long-term contract offer (e.g., 2-year plan with 15% discount).

Medium Risk: Customer likely to churn within the year. Recommendation: Add to a targeted email campaign offering a moderate incentive, such as a free premium service (e.g., OnlineBackup) for 6 months.
